requestBody.description: Batch of receipts with payments and items

fieldDescriptions.type: Receipt type such as B2C_RECEIPT, B2B_RECEIPT or NHAT_RECEIPT
fieldDescriptions.merchantTin: Registered TIN of the merchant issuing the receipt
fieldDescriptions.branchNo: Branch identifier registered with the tax authority
fieldDescriptions.posNo: POS terminal number configured in POSAPI
fieldDescriptions.billId: Unique identifier of the receipt inside the ERP
fieldDescriptions.invoiceId: Optional invoice sequence shared with accounting
fieldDescriptions.consumerNo: Citizen ID or phone number for B2C receipts
fieldDescriptions.totalVAT: VAT amount included in the receipt
fieldDescriptions.totalCityTax: City tax amount included in the receipt
fieldDescriptions.items: Array of goods or services included in the receipt
fieldDescriptions.qrData: QR code payload returned by POSAPI
